trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn stares at the floor despondently.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_01<tab>Search for a leakproof container.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_02<tab>Fill the leakproof container with ceruleum at the ceruleum spring.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the ceruleum-filled tank to the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_04<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>If Cagnazzo's intent was for his parting words to give us pause, then he has succeeded.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>To embrace death, to find satisfaction in oblivion... Perhaps it is indeed true that many voidsent yearn to return to the Lifestream.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_005<tab>Why does he look so defeated? We are closer to finding his sister, are we not?

TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_010<tab>The eye explains <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var> they managed to cross over, but we still don't know <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> they chose this time and this place for an incursion.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ENGINEER04671_000_015<tab>Looking to head back to Lapis Manalis? Just say the word.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>Venture to Lapis Manalis?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_020<tab>Oh, Azdaja... What has become of you, that even your eye should be so spent of aether...
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_021<tab>I cannot bear the thought of her being held captive a moment longer, but how will I find her? What must I do?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_022<tab>Calm yourself, Vrtra.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_023<tab>I appreciate that you are upset, but such passion clouds your judgment. You must endeavor to remain composed.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_024<tab>When your mind is clear, we may consider how to proceed with our search.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_025<tab><sigh> You are right...
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_026<tab>In the meantime, I will help Alphinaud and Alisaie back at the village.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_027<tab>That sounds like a fine idea. We should go as well.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>Oh, you've come too.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_035<tab>Leave Vrtra be. He needs time alone with his thoughts.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>Let us take comfort in the knowledge that the voidgate is closed, and that the people of Garlemald need fear the voidsent hordes no longer.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_045<tab>We're to help Alphinaud and Alisaie, are we? There's little else of interest here, so I wouldn't be opposed to the diversion.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_050<tab>Pray give me a moment longer.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>I don't see Vrtra with you. Is everything all right?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_061<tab>He needs a moment to himself. While he is indisposed, we thought we'd lend you a hand.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>I've just finished patrolling the area, so we're fine on that front.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_100_062<tab>There are no signs of voidsent, and I doubt we'll see any more now that the gate has been closed.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_063<tab>As for Alphinaud, he's set his sights on the ceruleum spring. We're hoping to take as much of the stuff as the snowcraft can bear.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_064<tab>That much fuel would keep the people warm for a good while.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_0065<tab>We've managed to procure a few suitable containers for transporting the ceruleum, and were about to return to the spring.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_066<tab>If you've a mind to scrounge up more containers, I can take what you have now and get them filled.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>Thank you, Estinien. The more we can load into the snowcraft, the better.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_068<tab>Would you and Y'shtola mind helping us with our search, then?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_069<tab>You'll need to take any suitable containers to the spring, and then back to the snowcraft once you've filled them with ceruleum.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>Any luck finding a container?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>Hmmm, will this be solid enough?
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>It is a welcome change to have Zero helping of her own volition. Perhaps she is finally beginning to trust us.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>This is less a container and more a sieve, given its poor condition and visible holes...
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SYSTEM_000_091<tab>The container appears to be well suited for repurposing. It would be a fine choice for ceruleum storage.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_100<tab>We just need to carry this liquid fire to the snowcraft? Sounds simple enough.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>The container is now filled to the brim with ceruleum.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_106<tab>If that one has been filled, you should hurry and take it to the snowcraft.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_107<tab>Estinien has already seen to the rest.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_108<tab>Go on ahead. The others asked that I remain here in the event they find more.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_110<tab>Good work, my friend. I expect we'll have a sizable load to deliver.

TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>The snowcraft is all but overflowing with ceruleum containers. However, several of your comrades have yet to arrive. Perhaps a nearby vantage point will afford you a more favorable view of their return.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>It was good seeing you again. I hope you'll remember to call on us sooner the next time you need help.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ESTINIEN_000_135<tab>Vrtra has quelled the tempest within his heart. He should be fine.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_140<tab>That Azdaja's eye hasn't succumbed to Darkness bespeaks her incredible resilience.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_YSHTOLA_000_141<tab>So let us trust in this sign that she yet lives, and be not deterred in our efforts.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_150<tab>I'm not your keeper, nor do I know what you expect of me. But I will keep my word.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_155<tab>I must apologize for my bout of melancholy. To be so easily shaken ill becomes a great wyrm.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_VARSHAHNBIG_000_156<tab>You have remained at my side and ever offered me support and encouragement. I haven't the words to thank you.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_160<tab>I suppose this is where we part ways for now.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALPHINAUD_000_161<tab>Though we have every faith in you, we will pray for your safety all the same.
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_ALISAIE_000_162<tab>I'm glad we had the chance to talk, Zero. Take care, and till next time!
TEXT_AKTKMJ106_04675_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_163<tab>Till next time.
